NoSuchFieldError(java.lang.String).Description: Constructs a NoSuchFieldError with the specified detail message.

NoSuchFieldError().Description: Constructs a NoSuchFieldError with no detail message.

ClassDesc: Thrown if an application tries to access or modify a specified field of an object, and that object no longer has that field. Normally, this error is caught by the compiler; this error can only occur at run time if the definition of a class has incompatibly changed.
